short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Blumgi Paintball - Compete in colorful 2-player paintball battles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience Blumgi Paintball - Compete in colorful 2-player paintball battles. Paint more territory than your opponent while using strategic bombs and movement tactics.

Master Blumgi Paintball's unique gameplay mechanics and challenge yourself to new achievements.

Movement Controls
- WAD or Arrow Keys - Move around
- S or Down Arrow - Use bomb

Game Actions
- Move to paint territory
- Use bombs strategically

Victory in Blumgi Paintball comes from painting more territory than your opponent while using strategic movement and well-timed bombs to control key areas.
